short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Easily track LinkedIn job states (Viewed, Applied, Saved) with timestamps and customizable highlights.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
-- LinkedIn Job Highlighter --

Organize your job applications with ease! LinkedIn Job Highlighter makes job hunting on LinkedIn more efficient by categorizing jobs into three states (Applied, Viewed, Saved) and offering full customization for highlights.

-- FEATURES --

- State Categorization: Divide jobs into Applied, Viewed, and Saved states for easy tracking.
- Customization Options: Highlight states with your desired colors and effects (Strikethrough, Underline, or Border).
- Differentiation Between Application Types: Recognize and manage "Apply" and "Easy Apply" actions.
- Timestamp Tracking: Automatically record timestamps when a job state is updated. Pre-existing states remain untouched unless clicked again.
- Settings Management: Save and reset preferences anytime with intuitive controls.

-- HOW IT WORKS --

- Install the extension from the Chrome Web Store.
- Browse LinkedIn job postings as usual.
- Customize highlight colors and effects via the extension popup.
- Track application states and timestamps directly on LinkedIn.

Make your job search more efficient today! Install the LinkedIn Job Highlighter extension.
